entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
